verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> you unto them that <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>hearts<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>;

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, that <S%H1980>follow<s%> their own <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and have seen <S%H7200>nothing<s%>!
O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are like the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> in the <S%H2723>deserts<s%>.

You have not gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H6556>gaps<s%>, neither made <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H1447>hedge<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

They have <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3176>them<s%>: and they have made others to hope that they would <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>.

Have you not <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4236>vision<s%>, and have you not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> a <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%>, whereas you <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>; although I have not spoken?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>, <S%H5002>therefore<s%>, behold, I am against you, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be upon the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and that <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>: they shall not be in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither shall they <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

<S%H2937>Because<s%>, even because they have seduced my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%>; and there was no <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and one built <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H2434>wall<s%>, <S%H2009>and<s%>, behold, others <S%H2902>coated<s%> it with untempered <S%H8602>mortar<s%>:

<S%H559>Say<s%> unto them which <S%H2902>daub<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> <S%H5307>mortar<s%>, that it shall fall: there shall be a <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%>; and <S%H859>you<s%>, O great <S%H417>hailstones<s%>, shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>; and a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall tear <S%H1234>it<s%>.
<S%H7023>Behold<s%>, when the wall is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, shall it not be <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2915>you<s%>, Where is the daubing with which you have coated <S%H2902>it<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will even <S%H1234>tear<s%> it with a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury<s%>; and there shall be a <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%> in my <S%H639>anger<s%>, and great <S%H417>hailstones<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to consume <S%H3617>it<s%>.

So will I break <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> that you have <S%H2902>coated<s%> with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> <S%H5060>mortar<s%>, and bring it down to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, so that the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> there shall be <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, and it shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and you shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H3045>there<s%>: and you shall know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and upon them that have <S%H2902>coated<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> <S%H559>mortar<s%>, and will say unto <S%H7023>you<s%>, The wall is no <S%H2902>more<s%>, neither they that coated it;

To <S%H5030>know<s%>, the prophets of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> concerning <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and which <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H7965>her<s%>, and there is no peace, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

<S%H1121>Likewise<s%>, you son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and prophesy you against <S%H5012>them<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the women that <S%H8609>sew<s%> <S%H3704>pillows<s%> to all <S%H679>armholes<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H6967>stature<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>! Will you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will you <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> alive that come unto <S%H2421>you<s%>?

And will you <S%H2490>pollute<s%> me among my <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and for <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that should not <S%H4191>die<s%>, and to <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> that should not <S%H2421>live<s%>, by your <S%H3576>lying<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H3577>lies<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H3704>Behold<s%>, I am against your pillows, with which <S%H859>you<s%> there <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly<s%>, and I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> them from your <S%H2220>arms<s%>, and will let the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly<s%>.

Your <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> also will I <S%H7167>tear<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall be no more in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to be <S%H4686>hunted<s%>; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Because with <S%H8267>lies<s%> you have made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3512>sad<s%>, whom I have not made <S%H3510>sad<s%>; and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>, that he should not <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, by promising him <S%H2421>life<s%>:

Therefore you shall <S%H2372>see<s%> no more <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, nor <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H7081>divinations<s%>: for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
